Opinion
per Curiam,
Order affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Pioneer Belting, Hose and Packing Corporation, Appellant, v. Commonwealth.
Submitted May 22, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Nix, JJ.
Michael Edelman, for appellant.
Stuart M. Blvuoas and Edwwrd A. Eosey, Assistant Attorney Generals, Robert W. CunMffe, Deputy Attorney General, and J. Shane Creamer, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
June 28, 1972:
